attributes.action: Give men the choice to pay child support or not
attributes.additional_details:
Pregnancy is entirely within the woman's control. Only she can choose to end it.

In situations where the woman wishes to keep the child and the man does not, allow the man to sign a document stating this and releasing him from all financial responsibilities.

Why should men pay for a child they do not want? A child whose existence they have no real control over. Having sex does not mean you want children, and accidents do happen. It is not fair that the next 18-20 years of the man's life is then dictated by the woman because of her choice. The woman's wants are obviously more important than the man's? Give men their freedom back.
